title: Quarto extensions
Quarto extensions
text:
Column Layout
Arrange content into columns of varying widths:



Motor Trend Car Road Tests
The data was extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, and comprises fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design and performance for 32 automobiles.








Learn more: Multiple Columns

title: Quarto extensions
text:
Incremental Lists (all for reveal)
Lists can optionally be displayed incrementally:


First item
Second item
Third item


. . .
 Insert pauses to make other types of content display incrementally.

Learn more: Incremental Lists

title: Quarto extensions
text:
Fragments
Incremental text display and animation with fragments:


Fade in


Slide up while fading in


Slide left while fading in


Fade in then semi out

. . .

Strike


Highlight red


Learn more: Fragments

title: Bernoulli Euler Kommission
text:
The Bernoulli-Euler-Kommission is the scientific board of the Bernoulli-Euler-Gesellschaft, a member society of Swiss Academy of Sciences (SCNAT). It is responsible for the planning, supervision and evaluation of all scholarly projects related to the edition, publication and computational presentation of the works of the Bernoulli family and Leonhard Euler.
Objective:

Reference editions of the works and correspondence of Leonhard Euler and the members of the Bernoulli family
Data publication of research data related to the editions in their historical context according to the FAIR rules
Development of a digital research environment for the editions and data integrating current AI methods and LLM models for accessing of the texts

title: Publication Series
text:
Editorial board: Bernoulli-Euler-Kommission







\(\LaTeX class\) the same for all volumes

Manuscripts can be submitted in various formats

Markdown (Quarto)
LaTeX Overleaf


Uniform font size, title page and page layout for all volumes
Hybrid publication by different media titles, page identical content

digital (BEG, Uni Basel, UB), ISSN
print (Publisher to be negotiated), ISBN
computational book, ISBN

New volumes increase the Series IVA counter

E.g. Euler-Condorcet becomes IVA 9
Followed e.g. Euler-alia, IVA 10

Only internal links, no external links




Sample Reference (see also Appendix) of Gilain, Hug, and Taton (2022), p.12.

Gilain, Christian, Vanja Hug, and Pierre Taton, eds. 2022. Correspondance de Leonhard Euler avec M.J.A.N. Caritat, Marquis de Condorcet et A.R.J. Turgot: Euler Opera Omnia, Series Quarta IVA 9. Vol. 5. Publikationen des Bernoulli-Euler-Zentrums. Basel: Bernoulli-Euler-Gesellschaft. https://doi.org/10.1007/BF01897804.
Fields Biblatex

  editor = {Christian Gilain and Vanja Hug and Pierre Taton},
  title = {Correspondance {de} Leonhard Euler {avec} {M.J.A.N. Caritat}, {Marquis de Condorcet} {et A.R.J. Turgot}},
  subtitle = {Euler Opera Omnia, Series Quarta {IVA 9}},

  url = {http://doi.org/10.1007/BF01897804},
  note = {},
  language = {English},
  }
